title: Did Donald Trump, Jr., say "women who cannot deal with harassment in the workplace should not succeed? '
subtitle: The son of the Mongol real estate in a radio programme in 2013 confirmed that women who could not deal with harassment in the workplace must teach kindergartens.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Donald Trump Jr. said that if women could not handle harassment in the workplace, they should teach kindergartens.
